activities.name: Brush teeth
activities.help: You can get points for brushing your teeth only 2 times a day (morning from 7am to 9am and evening from 7pm to 10pm)

activities.name: Math
activities.help: Ask dad to provide you math sheets. You can earn points 1 time each hour (from 7am to 7pm)

activities.name: Dishes
activities.help: Help parents with dishes and be rewarded by points. You can earn points once a day (from 7pm to 9pm)

activities.name: Cat chores
activities.help: You can give your pet some food every day from 7 to 9am

activities.name: Good food
activities.help: You can earn some points by eating good food (from 6am to 9am, from 12pm to 14pm, from 18pm to 19pm)

activities.name: Make the bed
activities.help: You can earn some points making your bed (from 7 to 9am)

activities.name: Laundry
activities.help: Help parents to sort our your laundry stuff. Earn points once a day

activities.name: Room clean up
activities.help: If your room got messy just clean it up.. and earn some points once a day (from 7am to 7pm)
